lines.text: The Ranger Service! Forty dollars a month and free taps when you die! It's all yours! You can have it!... And this Captain Jennings we're supposed to respect! I'd have gotten a better deal from any sidewinding half-breed in the country!

[suddenly appearing]
Kind of sneaky, isn't it, talking about a man when his back is turned!
Well, your back isn't turned now!
We'll just make that suspension permanent.
